CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Phone_Observation_Form",( Greeting_Total__c + Structure_Phone_Total__c + Phone_Etiquette_Total__c + Call_Handling_Skills_Total__c + Order_Management_Total__c + Procedures_Total_Phone__c + Closing_Total_Phone__c ) / 7, 0)
CustomField.label: Total Phone Observation Score
